name: Cutie Tutti Frutti
description:
"Cutie Tutti Frutti" is a game based on "3 in a row" mechanics. The goal of match-3 puzzles is to make groups, lines and rows of 3 or more identical tiles.

The player takes on the role of a cook who needs to collect the required amount of ingredients for a dish. As the difficulty increases further, more ingredients are required and their quantity also increases. Bonus tiles come to the rescue, such as a bomb, a knife, time freeze and other things.

The level is considered completed if the time has not expired and all the ingredients are collected.

Game Features:
  • 25 levels with increasing difficulty
  • Steam Achivements support
  • Easy to learn gameplay
  • Game makes you think fast
